name: 8 Ball Pool (itch) (NapTech Games)
description:
Play 8 Ball Pool Online for FREE! You can play against other players from all over the world and battle it out on one of many different courts. The gameplay is simple, but there are some really cool features that make this an awesome experience like leveling up your character so they're better at taking shots or gaining access to new equipment which will help you win more matches faster than ever before.

The 8 Ball Pool Online Multiplayer Game is an amazing way to spend some time with friends. The game modes are endless and there's always room for one more! 

You can play it on your own or join a public match - either way, you'll be strategizing about how best get the table in order before taking that first shot at sinking those balls into their respective pockets (or goals).

8 Ball Pool has introduced a new level system to keep you entertained. With this new system, you'll always face a challenge and get access to more exclusive match locations, where you play against only the best Pool players. You can also compete in tournaments and win rewards that improve your ranking.
